channel.title: How can I make it so admins can't drop/trade?
channel.description: Ok I'm using rickscape v5, not richscape rickscape...... Anyways I would like a code that makes it so my admins can't drop, or trade.... I know this is not a spoon feed site but i searched through-out the forums and Google and found no relative answers. PLEASE HELP!

item.title: How can I make it so admins can't drop/trade?
item.dc:creator: @deathbadger deathbadger
item.description:
@deathbadger wrote:

if (playerRights == 2) { sendMessage("Dropping has been disabled, use ::empty to delete your inventoy instead."); return ; }

Thats for dropping, it should work, if it doesn’t let me know.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 31, 2008, 09:43:46 am[/size][hr]if(other.playerRights == 2){ sendMessage("Admins cannot trade."); return; } if(playerRights == 2){ sendMessage("Admins cannot trade."); return; }

Thats for trade

Read full topic
item.source: How can I make it so admins can't drop/trade?
